Detailed Description

A class for the Stoichiometry matrix of the system.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

StoichiometryMatrix::StoichiometryMatrix ( int  row,
int  col 
)

constructor, creates a stoichiometry matrix with row number of rows, and col number of columns.

Parameters:
row an integer argument, indicating number of rows in the matrix.
col an integer argument, indicating number of columns in the matrix.

Member Function Documentation

double & StoichiometryMatrix::operator() ( int  row,
int  col 
)

operator override: get the reference of (row, col) element.

Normally this is used to set the value of the (row, col) element.

void StoichiometryMatrix::GetRow ( StochVector &  v,
int  n 
)

Assign vector v the value of the n th row of the matrix.

v must have the same dimension with matrix's row dimentsion. matrix row starts from zero.

void StoichiometryMatrix::GetCol ( StochVector &  v,
int  n 
)

Assign vector v the value of the n th column of the matrix.

v must have the same dimension with matrix's column dimentsion. matrix column starts from zero.

Matrix Matrix multiplication method.

This method writes the result directly to the result object. It avoids the copying result back to the caller space.

Member Data Documentation

boost::numeric::ublas::matrix<double> StoichiometryMatrix::data [private]

The data holder of the class.

using the matrix from boost ublas. This might give us benefit by using the efficient matrix vector operation provided by BLAS.
